title: Pokemon Sword and Shield Blowout - Kinda Funny Games 10.02.19
description:
O'Dell Harmon Jr. (https://twitter.com/ODellHarmonJr) returns to the show to react to all of Game Informer's news about Pokemon Sword and Shield!

Time Stamps - 
00:03:57 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Black Jack
Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:20 - Game Informer’s Pokemon Sword and Shield blowout
00:19:58 - PlayStation Opens Cross-Play to Everyone
00:21:52 - “How long do you think it will take before we start seeing developers utilizing the cross-play?” - The Five Star Man
00:28:13 - “Wasn't their message previously about not doing crossplay because of children's safety?” - The Nano BOOologist
00:30:21 - Mario & Luigi Developer AlphaDream Goes Bankrupt
00:32:55 - “What could they have done better to market themselves as a company worth picking up?” - Frankfurtterr
00:35:25 - Out today
00:38:43 - “Nintendo announced the 1.10 patch for Mario Maker 2 that finally adds online co-op…” - KBABZ
00:45:21 -  Quip
00:46:41 - Thirdlove
Reader mail   -
00:47:46 - “Follow up from yesterday's show regarding PS Now…” - Sofa King Sweet
00:54:22 - “Destiny 2: Shadowkeep launched with a lot of server down time…” - Borzen00
01:02:33 - Squad Up: Mike - PS4, Xbox One, Stadia - Phraylo
01:03:20 - Required Reading - https://bit.ly/2mYFXHM
01:04:46 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Imran

itunes:subtitle: O'Dell Harmon Jr. (https://twitter.com/ODellHarmo…
